info.longBusinessSummary: Sangetsu Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the planning, development, manufacture, sale, and installation of interior decorating products in Japan and internationally. It operates through the Domestic Interior, Domestic Exterior, and Overseas segments. The Domestic Interior segment is involved in the planning, manufacture, and sale of wallcoverings, flooring materials, fabrics, and other interior design materials, as well as space creation, design, and construction. Its Domestic Exterior segment offers exterior products, such as gates, fences, and carports, as well as design proposals and construction for outdoor spaces. The Overseas segment engages in the manufacture and sale of interior design materials, space design, and construction overseas. The company was formerly known as Sangetsudoshoten Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Sangetsu Corporation in 1970. Sangetsu Corporation was founded in 1849 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.
